name: Avoid PLC Procedures & Functions with a High Fan-out (PL1)
description:
This rule searches all the PLC procedures and functions having a large number of other artifacts that are referenced in them. When computing the Fan-Out of an Artifact, multiple accesses to the same component of an Artifact are counted as one access. 
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will. The default parameter value is 10.
output:
The report lists all the PLC procedures or functions having a High Fan-out. 

It provides following information: 
- procedure or function full name
rationale: The higher the number of referenced Artifacts, the more difficult the maintenance and evolution as all updates in referenced Artifacts will have to be tested and taken into account.
remediation: Reduce the number of artifacts referenced in it.
total: Number of  PLC Procedures and Functions.
